name: DOOM minus
description:
DOOM minus this is a new simple mod for doom. With new maps. Kill all the alien assholes and save the earth. this game, like other mods, contain a WAD file it is recommended to play on the source port GZDoom

the programs that were used for the mod

  1. GZDoom Builder
  2. Doom Writer
  3. Slade
  4. WhackEd4
  5. anvil studio
  6. Tux Guitar
  7. Adobe photoshop
  8. GZDoom

good game for you;)
